import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../store/CartContext' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import classes from './Cart.module.css' const Cart=(props)=>{ const cartctx=useContext(CartContext); const totalamount=cartctx.item.amount.tofi const cartitems=
    {[{id:'c1',name:'sushi',amount:2,price:12.56}].map((item) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
return {cartitems}
Total Amount 35.45
} export default Cart;
